import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Layout, Typography, InputNumber, Popover } from 'antd' import axios from 'axios' const { Header, Footer, Content } = Layout const { Title } = Typography const formItemLayout = { labelCol: { xs: { span: 24 }, sm: { span: 8 }, }, wrapperCol: { xs: { span: 20 }, sm: { span: 12 }, }, } const categorieInfos = (

) export default function Home(){ const [prix, setPrix] = useState(0) const [nb_devices, setNbDevices] = useState(0) const [taille, setTaille] = useState(0) const [categorie, setCategorie] = useState('') const [nbLang, setNbLang] = useState(0) const [nbAvisTotal, setNbAvisTotal] = useState(0) const [nbAvisVersion, setNbAvisVersion] = useState(0) const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let data = { prix, nb_devices, taille, categorie, nbLang, nbAvisTotal, nbAvisVersion } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/', data) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } return(
